flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
You will learn how to make your own pair of sneakers blink brightly with LED lights controlled by a RBBB Arduino.

1.0 FEATURES:

- 1 color LEDs

- 6 patterns

- reed sensors + magnets that give you control to step through patterns

- detachable velcro design

- small, wearable microcontroller + power

guide.summary: Create your own Super Bright LED-lined sneakers that blink with multiple patterns.
guide.title: Super Brite LED Sneakers 1.0
